statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Terraza coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.70} per pound with some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.90} per pound to create \displaystyle{90} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.09} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
